page.title: 12THE COUCIL DEPOT. N.Y.C.C.13
page.content: In Green Hammerton there is a Council Depot for Division l3. We went to see it. There was lots of machinery for winter.Such as salt gritters and snow ploughs.we saw piles of grit.We saw things like kerb stone,gully pots, road sighs.Paraffin lamps to light up road works.There was a Porta loo _a sort of loo of workmen to use and a cabin to make tea in.We brought back several cats eyes.They will have once been stuck in the middle of the road. What happens is the car lights reflect on the glass balls they seem to light up.But if a car runs over them they don't get damaged, because the rubber pad that holds them squashes into the ground.
